title: Why punctuate?
brief_description: Designed to help the teacher to introduce pupils to the study of punctuation, or to help revise the study of punctuation, this film presents the most important punctuation marks, and the basic rules for their use so that pupils’ interest will be aroused and their study of the subject motivated.
